name: MindfulnessGuidedMeditation

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mindfulness guided meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mindfulness Guided Meditation is the Alexa skill that allows you to enjoy peaceful, guided meditation sessions whenever you need them. With over 10 unique meditations, featuring a range of calming voices and soothing background sounds, each 10-minute session is designed to bring relaxation to both your body and mind.

Upgrade to premium mode for access to:

• Professional meditation voices
• A variety of background sounds tailored for deep relaxation
• Unlimited access to all sessions without restrictions
• Continuously updated meditation paths

We value your feedback to help us improve and offer the best mindfulness experience possible.

Enjoy your journey to tranquility!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
